des:
You can use Amazon Echo control the plug, if your plug is connected to other electrical appliances, such as light , fans, air conditioning and so on, you can also control them easiy.
Before using Amazon Echo control the plug, Amazon Echo is required to bind your plug. Here are some steps you need to do:
1.Open“Amazon Alexa”APP and select“Skills”in the left menu.
2.Search“Smartplug Control AI” and click “Enable”to enable the skill.Enter the account and password in the new window for binding the account.
3.After login successfully ,some devices will be displayed;click “Add Device” for re-synchronizing the devices information .
 After Alexa finds your plug, you can call ALexa to turn on or off your plug. The name of plug supports user - defined modification. For example, if your plug’s name is Tom 's smart plug, you can say to Alexa:
Alexa,turn on Tom’s smart plug.
Alexa,turn off Tom’s smart plug.
